home.header: Get to know my experience and my projects
about.header: Live as if you were to die tomorrow, learn as if you were to live forever
about.fParagraph: I am a Frontend developer with knowledge in Backend and a great passion for technology. My commitment and discipline at work are high, always seeking to offer innovative and quality solutions to meet project needs.
about.sParagraph: I enjoy working in teams and collaborating to achieve common goals. I am always in constant learning to improve my skills and stay updated on the latest trends and technologies in the market. I am a proactive person focused on results, willing to face new challenges and opportunities in the world of technology.
about.subTitle: React-hooks (Cornell Notes)
